full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, , BSNYEN GNAS YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA 'DI NI, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG RAB KYI DGONGS DON LHAR 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI PHYAG BZHES SU GNANG BA LA GZHI BYAS, ,TSIG DON RNAMS DKYUS SU BSHAD NA RTOGS DKA' BAS, ,GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS LOGS SU 'PHANGS TE, ,LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA 'DI NI, KHYIM PA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA'I SLAD DU, ,ZA HOR GYI BAN DHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYANG HA LA KHAR SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
